segments.text: Why are you in court today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I got a ticket , and I would like to fight it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is the officer that pulled you over here today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The officer says that I ran a red light , but I didn't .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The officer wouldn't lie about that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He must've , because the signal had a camera on top of it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There was no picture taken of your license plate ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't believe it took my picture .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm just going to let you go .
segments.speaker: S1
